title: Death of a Gunfighter
description: Frank Patch had outlived his usefulness to the town of Cottonwood Springs and the townspeople were determined to get rid of him--one way of the another.But Patch had been their sheriff for twenty years. He had fought, bled and killed to turn a lawless cattle town into a peaceful community and being sheriff was the only life he knew.Then Luke Mills, a harmless drunk, tried to gun Patch down?
author: Lewis B. Patten
